<IMAWebOpenerDelegate> Protocol Reference

Signals that a internal or external web browser has been opened or closed. More...

#import <IMAAdsRenderingSettings.h>

Inherits <NSObject>.

Inherited by IMASampleViewController, IMASampleViewController(), and OOIMAManager().

Instance Methods

(void) - webOpenerWillOpenExternalBrowser:
 Called when Safari is about to be opened.
 
(void) - webOpenerWillOpenInAppBrowser:
 Called before in-app browser opens.
 
(void) - webOpenerDidOpenInAppBrowser:
 Called when the in app browser is shown on the screen.
 
(void) - webOpenerWillCloseInAppBrowser:
 Called when in-app browser is about to close.
 
(void) - webOpenerDidCloseInAppBrowser:
 Called when in-app browser finishes closing.

(void) - willOpenInAppBrowser
 
(void) - didOpenInAppBrowser
 
(void) - willCloseInAppBrowser
 
(void) - didCloseInAppBrowser
 

Detailed Description

Signals that a internal or external web browser has been opened or closed.

For an external browser (Mobile Safari), the delegate is only notified before opening.
